Name: Cushion cover with centaur
Description: This cushion cover is decorated with a rectangle containing vines forming five medallions. Four of the medallions are separated by baskets filled with fruit. The centre medallion depicts a centaur armed with a shield; from a Christian perspective he could symbolise the ultimate battle against evil. Several different techniques were used for this piece - intersecting chain stitches, groups of ordinary links, and details picked out using the flying thread technique.
